trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
Target Values
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> class creates a transition between two target values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> 클래스 두 대상 값 사이의 변환을 생성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To set its target values, use its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 대상 값을 설정 하려면 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 요약 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성을 함께 사용할 수 있습니다. 또는 개별적으로 애니메이션의 대상 값을 확인 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Properties specified
Resulting behavior

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기준 값 또는 이전 애니메이션 속성의 구성 방식에 따라 값을 출력 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 의해 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 속성의 기준 값에서 진행 되는 애니메이션 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력 값으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기본값은 애니메이션이 적용 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력에 지정 된 값과 값의 합계를 구할 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 모두 설정 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성이 우선 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 를 다른 보간 메서드를 사용 하거나 두 개 이상의 대상 값 사이 애니메이션을 적용 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 단일 속성에 여러 애니메이션을 적용 하는 방법에 대 한 내용은 [키 프레임 애니메이션 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features

Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> class inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> 클래스에서 상속 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation> 다음을 포함 하는 몇 가지 특수 기능을 사용 하는 개체: 여러 개체 간에 공유로 선언, 성능 향상을 위해 읽기 전용, 복제, 고 수 수행 스레드로부터 안전 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 참조는 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class.
The destination value of the animation.
The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration.
The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
The destination value of the animation.
The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
The starting value of the animation.
The destination value of the animation.
The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration.
The starting value of the animation.
The destination value of the animation.
The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션이 시작 값을 변경하는 총 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> ""시작 이나 끝 값을 지정 하는 대신 특정 양 만큼 값에 애니메이션을 적용 하려는 경우에 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You may also use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 된 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 요약 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성을 함께 사용할 수 있습니다. 또는 개별적으로 애니메이션의 대상 값을 확인 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
Resulting Behavior

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기준 값 또는 이전 애니메이션 속성의 구성 방식에 따라 값을 출력 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 의해 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 속성의 기준 값에서 진행 되는 애니메이션 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력 값으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기본값은 애니메이션이 적용 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력에 지정 된 값과 값의 합계를 구할 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **참고** 모두 설정 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성이 우선 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 를 다른 보간 메서드를 사용 하거나 두 개 이상의 대상 값 사이 애니메이션을 적용 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* `By`="<xref:System.Windows.Vector>"/>
\- or -
<*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
XAML Property Element Usage
\<*object*>
<*object*.`By`>
</*object*.`By`>
\</*object*>
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata Properties set to **true**
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By" /> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" />.
The new instance.
Gets or sets the easing function applied to this animation.
The easing function applied to this animation.
Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.
trans-unit.target: 감속/가속 함수를 사용 하 여 스프링 진동 및 다양 한 크기 가속 및 감속 애니메이션, 다양 한 반송 포함 하 여 특수 애니메이션 효과 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the animation's starting value.
The starting value of the animation.
The default value is null.

The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 요약 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성을 함께 사용할 수 있습니다. 또는 개별적으로 애니메이션의 대상 값을 확인 하 합니다.

Resulting Behavior

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* `From`="<xref:System.Windows.Vector>"/>
\- or -
<*object* `From`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
XAML Property Element Usage
\<*object*>
<*object*.`From`>
</*object*.`From`>
\</*object*>
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to **true**
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From" /> dependency property.
The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the animation.
Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation" />.
The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `defaultOriginValue` 은 첫 번째 컴퍼지션 체인에서이 값이 됩니다 (있는 경우) 스냅숏 값 또는 기본 속성 값; 그렇지 않으면이 값을 이전 애니메이션 체인에서 반환한 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> 없는 < c4 > <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue` 경우 기준 값은 애니메이션 속성의 첫 번째 컴퍼지션 계층 이며 그렇지 않은 경우이 값은 이전 컴퍼지션 계층 속성에 대 한 애니메이션의 출력 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value.
<see langword="true" /> if the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 대상 속성의 현재 값을이 애니메이션의 시작 값;에 추가 해야 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.

If the animation has only one of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties set, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 중 하나만 있으면 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성 집합을이 속성 설정에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to **true**
None
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
**true** if the animation accumulates its values when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: **true 이면** 애니메이션이 해당 값을 누적 하면 때 해당 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 속성으로 인해 단순 지속 시간 동안 반복 될 합니다.

trans-unit.source: otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **false**.

When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성이로 설정 된 경우 **true**, 출력 될 때이 값만 누적 애니메이션의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> 속성으로 인해 단순 지속 시간 동안 반복 될 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 부모 항목이 반복 다시 시작할 때 또는에서 해당 clock이 때문에 해당 값이 누적 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the animation's ending value.
The ending value of the animation.
The default value is null.

The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 요약 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성을 함께 사용할 수 있습니다. 또는 개별적으로 애니메이션의 대상 값을 확인 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
Resulting Behavior

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기준 값 또는 이전 애니메이션 속성의 구성 방식에 따라 값을 출력 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A>

The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 값은 애니메이션이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 속성에 의해 지정 된 값을는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.From%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 속성의 기준 값에서 진행 되는 애니메이션 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력 값으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 효과 줄 속성의 기본값은 애니메이션이 적용 또는 이전 애니메이션의 출력에 지정 된 값과 값의 합계를 구할 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **참고** 모두 설정 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To%2A> 속성이 우선 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.By%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 를 다른 보간 메서드를 사용 하거나 두 개 이상의 대상 값 사이 애니메이션을 적용 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* `To`="<xref:System.Windows.Vector>"/>
\- or -
<*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
XAML Property Element Usage
\<*object*>
<*object*.`To`>
</*object*.`To`>
\</*object*>
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to **true**
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimation.To" /> dependency property.
